name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
achievementGroupName: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II

stage1.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
stage1.description: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

stage2.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
stage2.description: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

stage3.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
stage3.description: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.
